Automate Tasks, Build Focus

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.5″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” header_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width__hover_enabled=”on” max_width__hover=”75%”]

We use cutting edge AI and automation technology to build, connect, deploy, and manage intelligent bots to naturally interact with your users on a website, app, or external device.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” custom_margin=”48px||48px” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.5″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/left-bg7.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_left”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Intelligent bots built on the most powerful bot framework hands down

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Higher Engagement” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Higher-Engagement.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px|32px|32px|32px|true|true” animation_direction=”bottom”]

Use visual content and proactive conversations to boost sales.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Personlized Experiences” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Personlized-Experiences.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px|32px|32px|32px|true|true”]

Get users to take action quicker and have more pleasurable interactions.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Lead Nurturing” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Lead-Nurturing.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px|32px|32px|32px|true|true”]

Bots are more reliable and can collect information for you.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Task Automation” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Task-Automation.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px|32px|32px|32px|true|true”]

Less focus on the micro and more focus on what actually matters.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Cost Savings” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Cost-Savings.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px|32px|32px|32px|true|true”]

Drive cost savings through higher productivity from your team.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Data Mining” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Data-Minining.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px|32px|32px|32px|true|true”]

Collect and leverage information in ways that humans can’t.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” background_size_2=”contain” background_position_2=”bottom_center” background_repeat_2=”no-repeat” custom_css_main_2=”margin: auto auto 0;” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” animation_style=”fade”]

CHATBOTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” animation_style=”fade”]

That Don’t Suck

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade”]

We’ve seen them chatbots that are no more than window dressing, an attempt to be cool, but chatbots can be so much more. They can solve real problems, they can learn from there mistakes and they can help your customers resolve issues with little or no help from human intervention.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_center” background_repeat=”no-repeat” custom_css_main=”margin: auto auto 0;”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Bot-Assist.svg” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.5″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg-ornament.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_right”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” custom_css_main_1=”margin: auto auto 0;” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on” custom_css_main=”margin: auto auto 0;”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/conversational-interface.svg” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” animation_style=”fade”]

CONVERSATIONAL INTERFACE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” animation_style=”fade”]

Web and Mobile

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” animation_style=”fade”]

Long gone are the days of static applications that feel more like boring tools than a helping hand. The beauty of conversational interfaces is that you and your customers forget that your using software and instead feel like your interacting with something that has a personality that resonates with the core of your brand.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” custom_css_main_2=”margin: auto auto 0;” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” animation_style=”fade”]

Voice assistants

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” animation_style=”fade”]

Alexa, Google and More

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade”]

Voice assistants aren’t just for Star Trek anymore. They can solve real problems within the enterprise. By using the devices around them, your employees and your customers can be assisted and easily resolve simple time consuming tasks everyday.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on” custom_css_main=”margin: auto auto 0;”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/voice-assistant.svg” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_row padding_left_right_link_1=”false” padding_left_right_link_2=”false” module_class=”vdivide” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||16px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade”]

Enterprises

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_font_size=”28px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”|32px||32px||true” animation_style=”fade”]

Automate your entire business.

Create a network of hundreds or thousands of bots to create a hive of automation.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Bot-Collaboration.svg” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ custom_margin=”72px||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||16px” animation_style=”fade”]

brands

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_font_size=”28px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”|32px||32px||true” animation_style=”fade”]

Build one bot to rule them all.

Build one super powerful bot that free up your employees to focus on what matters.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Big-Bot.svg” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ custom_margin=”72px||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.5″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg-ornament-bottom.svg” background_size=”contain” background_position=”center_right” global_module=”1051″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” custom_css_main_2=”margin: auto auto 0;” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” animation_style=”fade”]

clients

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” animation_style=”fade”]

Featured Teams

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”65%” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade”]

We’ve had the pleasure of working with some awesome teams around the world.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Have a Quetion?” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” custom_margin=”40px||” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on” custom_css_main=”margin: auto auto 0;”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/clients.png” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”top”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
